00020 const MathColor MathColor::transparent;
00021 
00022 const char *MathColor::nametable[17] = {"aqua", "black", "blue", "fuchsia",
00023         "gray", "green", "lime", "maroon", "navy", "olive", "purple", "red",
00024         "silver", "teal", "white", "yellow", "transparent"};
00025 const MathColor *MathColor::colortable[17] = {&aqua, &black, &blue, &fuchsia,
00026         &gray, &green, &lime, &maroon, &navy, &olive, &purple, &red, &silver,
00027         &teal, &white, &yellow, &transparent};
00028 
00029 MathColor::MathColor() {
00030         transp = valid = true;
00031 }
00032 MathColor::MathColor(const DOMString &d) {
00033         // check for a predefined color
00034         for (uint i=0; i<17; ++i) {
00035                 if (!strcasecmp(d.utf8(), nametable[i])) {
00036                         *this = *colortable[i];
00037                         return;
00038                 }
00039         }
00040         // convert RGB color
00041         uint len = d.length();
00042         if ((len != 4 && len != 7) || d[0] != '#') {
00043                 valid = false;
00044                 return;
00045         }
00046         valid = true;
00047         transp = false;
00048         if (len == 4) {
00049                 rr = 16*getValue(d[1]);
00050                 gg = 16*getValue(d[2]);
00051                 bb = 16*getValue(d[3]);
00052         } else {
00053                 rr = getValue(d[1], d[2]);
00054                 gg = getValue(d[3], d[4]);
00055                 bb = getValue(d[5], d[6]);
00056         }
00057 }
00058 bool
00059 MathColor::operator==(const MathColor &m) const {
00060         if (!valid && !m.valid) return true;
00061         if (!valid || !m.valid) return false;
00062         if (transp && m.transp) return true;
00063         if (transp || m.transp) return false;
00064         return rr == m.rr && gg == m.gg && bb == m.bb;
00065 }
00066 bool
00067 MathColor::operator!=(const MathColor &m) const {
00068         return !(*this == m);
00069 }
00070 bool
00071 MathColor::isTransparent() const {
00072         return !valid || transp;
00073 }
00074 bool
00075 MathColor::isValid() const {
00076         return valid;
00077 }
00078 int
00079 MathColor::getValue(ushort h) {
00080         if (h >= '0' && h <= '9') {
00081                 return h - '0';
00082         }
00083         if (h >= 'a' && h <= 'f') {
00084                 return 10 + h - 'a';
00085         }
00086         if (h >= 'A' && h <= 'F') {
00087                 return 10 + h - 'A';
00088         }
00089         valid = false;
00090         return -1;
00091 }
00092 int
00093 MathColor::getValue(ushort h1, ushort h2) {
00094         return 16*getValue(h1) + getValue(h2);
00095 }
00096 void
00097 MathColor::setRgb(uchar r, uchar g, uchar b) {
00098         rr = r; gg = g; bb = b;
00099         valid = true;
00100         transp = false;
00101 }

00103 MathColor::r() const {

00107 MathColor::g() const {
